name: RandomThoughts
0:
”Alexa, open Random Thoughts”
”Alexa, ask Random Thoughts to give me a thought”
”Alexa, ask Random Thoughts to tell me something”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random thoughts
des: Say "Alexa, Open Random Thoughts" and she will speak one of approximately 60 random thoughts. These are the best of /r/showthoughts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
